galleryManagement.title: Gallery Management
galleryManagement.description: Create and manage photo gallery events for your tenant or the entire platform.

dialog.globalCheckbox: Make this a platform-wide event (visible to all tenants)

updated.title: Event Updated
updated.description: The event '{title}' has been successfully updated.

created.title: Event Created
created.description: The new event '{title}' has been added to the gallery.

deleted.title: Event Deleted
deleted.description: The event has been removed from the gallery.

emailTemplates.title: Email Template Management
emailTemplates.description: Customize the automated emails sent to users in your tenant. Use placeholders to include dynamic content.
emailTemplates.editingDescription: Modify the subject and body of this email.

placeholders.title: Placeholders
placeholders.resetLink: URL for password reset (Password Reset only).
placeholders.partnerName: Name of the other person in the appointment.
placeholders.appointmentDateTime: Formatted date and time of the appointment.
placeholders.appointmentLink: Link to view the appointment details.

activityLog.title: Activity Log
activityLog.description: A log of your recent actions and system events within JobMatch AI.

appointments.title: My Appointments
appointments.pageDescription: View and manage your scheduled appointments, mock interviews, and assigned community requests.
appointments.noScheduled: You have no appointments or assigned requests.
appointments.toastJoinMeetingDesc: This would launch the video conferencing link.
appointments.toastDeclinedDesc: The appointment request has been declined.
appointments.toastCompletedDesc: The appointment has been marked as complete.
appointments.toastRescheduleDesc: A reschedule request has been sent to {user}.
appointments.toastFeedbackDesc: Thank you for your feedback on your session with {user}.

bookmarks.title: My Bookmarks
bookmarks.noPosts: You haven't bookmarked any community posts yet.
bookmarks.noBlogs: You haven't bookmarked any blog articles yet.
bookmarks.noQuestions: You haven't bookmarked any interview questions yet.
bookmarks.noResumeScans: You haven't bookmarked any resume scan reports yet.

removed.title: Bookmark Removed
removed.post: Post has been removed from your bookmarks.
removed.blog: Blog post has been removed from your bookmarks.
removed.question: Question has been removed from your bookmarks.
removed.scan: Resume scan has been removed from your bookmarks.

aiResumeWriter.title: AI Resume Writer
aiResumeWriter.description: Adapt your resume for different roles and industries with AI assistance. Select an existing resume or paste your content, then specify your target.
aiResumeWriter.baseResumePlaceholder: Paste your current resume text here...
aiResumeWriter.targetRolePlaceholder: e.g., Senior Software Engineer, Product Manager
aiResumeWriter.skillsToHighlightPlaceholder: e.g., Project Management, Python, Data Visualization
aiResumeWriter.additionalInstructionsPlaceholder: e.g., Emphasize leadership experience, make it suitable for a startup environment.
aiResumeWriter.generatingMessage: AI is crafting your resume variant...
aiResumeWriter.generatedResumeDescription: Review the AI-generated resume text below. You can edit it or copy it.

saveDialog.title: Save Resume Version
saveDialog.description: Give this new resume version a name to save it to your "My Resumes" list.

toast.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to use this feature.

generationSuccess.title: Resume Variant Generated
generationSuccess.description: The new resume version is ready below.

generationFailed.title: Generation Failed
generationFailed.description: An error occurred while generating the resume variant.

nameRequired.title: Name Required
nameRequired.description: Please provide a name for the resume profile.

coverLetterGenerator.title: AI Cover Letter Generator
coverLetterGenerator.description: Create a personalized cover letter tailored to a specific job description using your profile information.
coverLetterGenerator.jobDescriptionPlaceholder: Paste the full job description here...
coverLetterGenerator.profileInfoNote: Your detailed profile & resume text are used by the AI
coverLetterGenerator.additionalNotesPlaceholder: e.g., Mention my recent X project, Emphasize Y skill specifically for this role.
coverLetterGenerator.generatingMessage: AI is crafting your cover letter...
coverLetterGenerator.generatedCoverLetterDescription: Review the AI-generated cover letter. You can edit it or copy it.

toast.mustBeLoggedIn: You must be logged in to use this feature.

generationSuccess.title: Cover Letter Generated
generationSuccess.description: Your personalized cover letter is ready below.

generationFailed.title: Generation Failed
generationFailed.description: An error occurred while generating the cover letter.
